scripts.dev: pnpm --filter "@mastra/*" -r build && concurrently "pnpm --filter kenshu-matcher-backend dev" "wait-on http://localhost:4000/health && pnpm --filter kenshu-matcher-frontend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter "@mastra/core" build && pnpm --filter "@mastra/llamaindex" build && pnpm --filter kenshu-matcher-backend build && pnpm --filter kenshu-matcher-frontend build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter kenshu-matcher-frontend lint && pnpm --filter kenshu-matcher-backend lint
